name: CCRI 1921 Census of Canada: Aggregate data and geography = CCRI 1921 Recensement du Canada: Données agrégées et cadre géographique
description: This study includes two components of the research infrastructure developed by CCRI for the 1921 Census of Canada: selected digitized published tables of aggregate data and a reconstruction of the census geography.

distribution.name: CCRI_Canada_CD_1921_ESRI_Metadata.pdf
distribution.description: ESRI metadata in .pdf format for the 1921 Census division (CD) polygon files.

distribution.name: CCRI_Canada_CSD_1921_ESRI_Metadata.pdf
distribution.description: ESRI metadata in .pdf format for the 1921 Census subdivision (CSD) polygon files.

distribution.name: CCRI_digitized_published_tables.pdf
distribution.description: Summary of all tables from the 1911 to 1951 censuses digitized by the CCRI.

distribution.name: ccri_pub_1921_v1t16.xls
distribution.description: Table: 1921, Vol. 1, Table 16. Title: Population, Canadian, British and Foreign born, classified by sex for counties or census divisions, 1921. Source: Canada. Dominion Bureau of Statistics. 1921. Sixth Census of Canada. Ottawa: King's Printer, Vol. 1, Table 16, pp. 249-339. Basic unit of Geography: Census subdistrict (CSD).

distribution.name: ccri_pub_1921_v1t27.xls
distribution.description: Table: 1921, Vol. 1, Table 27. Title: Population classified according to principal origins of the people by counties or census divisions, 1921. Source: Canada. Dominion Bureau of Statistics. 1921. Sixth Census of Canada. Ottawa: King's Printer, Vol. 1, Table 27, pp. 382-541. Basic unit of Geography: Census subdistrict (CSD).

distribution.name: ccri_pub_1921_v1t38.xls
distribution.description: Table: 1921, Vol. 1, Table 38. Title: Population classified according to principal religions of the people by counties or census divisions, 1921. Source: Canada. Dominion Bureau of Statistics. 1921. Sixth Census of Canada. Ottawa: King's Printer, Vol. 1, Table 38, pp. 604-755. Basic unit of Geography: Census subdistrict (CSD).

distribution.name: ccri_pub_1921_v3t3.xls
distribution.description: Table: 1921, Vol. 3, Table 3. Title: Dwellings and households, classified as rural and urban, for counties or census divisions, 1921. Source: Canada. Dominion Bureau of Statistics. 1921. Sixth Census of Canada. Ottawa: King's Printer, Vol. 1, Table 3, pp. 6-7. Basic unit of Geography: Census district (CD).

distribution.name: CCRI_Shapefiles_CD_1921.zip
distribution.description: Boundary polygon files in ESRI "shape file" format that reconstruct the census compilation and dissemination geography for the 1921 at the Census division (CD) level of geography. A NAP metadata record in .xml format is included.

distribution.name: CCRI_Shapefiles_CSD_1921.zip
distribution.description: Boundary polygon files in ESRI "shape file" format that reconstruct the census compilation and dissemination geography for the 1921 Census at the Census subdivision (CSD) level of geography. A NAP metadata record in .xml format is included.

distribution.name: CCRI_User_Guide_excerpts.pdf
distribution.description: Excerpts from the CCRI User Guide relevant to the geographic and aggregate data components of the CCRI.

distribution.name: IRCS_guide_d'usage_extraits.pdf
distribution.description: Extraits du guide d'usage de l'IRCS reliés aux éléments du c​adre géographique et de l'ensemble de données agrégées de l'IRCS.

distribution.name: IRCS_tableaux_publiés_numérisés.pdf
distribution.description: Sommaire de tous les tableaux des recensements de 1911 à 1951 numérisés par l'IRCS.

distribution.name: Reference_Maps_1921.zip
distribution.description: A collection of maps in .pdf format detailing the 1921 census geography for each province.

distribution.name: v1t16_1921.pdf
distribution.description: Description of variables in 1921, Vol. 1, Table 16.

distribution.name: v1t27_1921.pdf
distribution.description: Description of variables in 1921, Vol. 1, Table 27.

distribution.name: v1t38_1921.pdf
distribution.description: Description of variables in 1921, Vol. 1, Table 38.

distribution.name: v3t3_1921.pdf
distribution.description: Description of variables in 1921, Vol. 3, Table 3.
